00114 //----------------------------------------------------------
00115 bool
00116 GrFrustumSet::IsPolygonVisible( const GrPolygon& polygon ) const
00117 {
00120         const unsigned int frustumCount = ( unsigned int )_frustums.size();
00121         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < frustumCount; ++i )
00122         {
00123                 if ( _frustums[ i ]->IsPolygonInside( polygon ) )
00124                         return true;
00125         }
00126 
00128         return false;
00129 }

00132 //==========================================================

00136 //----------------------------------------------------------
00137 void
00138 GrFrustumSet::GenFrustumsFromPortals( const GrFrustum& baseFrustum, const GrPortalSet& portals, float tolerance )
00139 {
00141         const unsigned int portalCount = portals.GetPortalCount();
00142         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < portalCount; ++j )
00143         {
00146                 if ( portals.IsPortalVisible( baseFrustum, j ) )
00147                 {
00149                         GrFrustum* newFrustum = new GrFrustum( baseFrustum );
00150                         portals.AddPortalToFrustum( *newFrustum, j );
00151                         _frustums.push_back( newFrustum );
00152                 }
00153         }
00154 }
00155

00161         const unsigned int portalSetCount = ( unsigned int )portalSets.size();
00162         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < portalSetCount; ++i )
00163                 GenFrustumsFromPortals( baseFrustum, *portalSets[ i ], tolerance );
